attributes.action: Give a one off £12k grant to all those excluded from both SEISS & CJRS
attributes.additional_details: Because leaving people behind the rest of the country is immoral
attributes.background: Give a one off grant to all those who have been unable to access both SEISS and CJRS and who have either a UTR or were PAYE in 2020

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319899
